index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF SOCIAL AND HEALTH SERVICES
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Public Health Department; authorizing amendments to certain agreements authorized by Ordinance 104300 to provide additional financial assistance to the City for the Supplemental Food Program for Women, Infants, and Children (W.I.C.), establishing additional positions and increasing certain expenditure allowances in the 1975 Budget of said Department in connection therewith, asking a reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund, and declaring the emergency therefor.
